tags.name: next-image
tags.description: Next.js Image component for optimized images

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: The path or URL to the source image

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Intrinsic width of the image in pixels

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: Intrinsic height of the image in pixels

attributes.name: fill
attributes.description: Boolean that causes the image to fill the parent element

attributes.name: sizes
attributes.description: Media condition string for responsive images

attributes.name: priority
attributes.description: Boolean to prioritize the image for loading

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Placeholder to use while the image is loading

tags.name: next-link
tags.description: Next.js Link component for client-side navigation

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: The path or URL to navigate to

attributes.name: as
attributes.description: Optional decorator for the path that will be shown in the browser URL bar

attributes.name: replace
attributes.description: Replace the current history state instead of adding a new url into the stack

attributes.name: scroll
attributes.description: Scroll to the top of the page after a navigation

attributes.name: shallow
attributes.description: Update the path of the current page without rerunning getStaticProps, getServerSideProps or getInitialProps
